vocabinfos.mediumDef:
§ This name is used for:
1) place of corner structure, corner buttress, inner corner-buttress
1a) corner post, buttress-place, buttress
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 轉角處, 轉彎處, 街角的內壁
1a) 轉角的柱子, 扶壁, 支撐物
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
1) 转角处, 转弯处, 街角的内壁
1a) 转角的柱子, 扶壁, 支撑物
